skills.description: I have been actively involved in the end-to-end development process, from conceptualization to production. I am well-versed in SCRUM methodologies, including task planning, time estimation, and participation in sprints. Developed and maintained existing modules in the system of registration and processing of applications from external applicants, including interaction with telephony. Was involved in the layout of adaptive modules based on Figma layouts using BEM methodology.
Design and development of user interfaces. Projecting layout. Writing HTTP request. Participation in the development of an e-commerce platform operating in the Baltic States.
Developing and maintaining websites and web applications. Creating and maintaining web applications using React, Vue.

skills.position: Master of Applied Mathematics and Computer Science
skills.description: In applied math and computer science, I learned how to work with important programming tools. We learn Python, C++, and Java to create algorithms and develop applications. I also learned databases and SQL to work with information, algorithms and data structures while preparing certification projects.
